query: CREATE TABLE update_test ( a   INT DEFAULT 10, b   INT, c   TEXT )
expected: CREATE TABLE update_test (a INT DEFAULT 10, b INT, c TEXT)

query: CREATE TABLE upsert_test ( a   INT PRIMARY KEY, b   TEXT )
expected: CREATE TABLE upsert_test (a INT PRIMARY KEY, b TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO update_test VALUES (5, 10, 'foo')
INSERT INTO update_test(b, a) VALUES (15, 10)
expected: INSERT INTO update_test (b, a) VALUES (15, 10)

query: SELECT * FROM update_test
UPDATE update_test SET a = DEFAULT, b = DEFAULT
UPDATE update_test AS t SET b = 10 WHERE t.a = 10
UPDATE update_test t SET b = t.b + 10 WHERE t.a = 10
expected: UPDATE update_test AS t SET b = t.b + 10 WHERE t.a = 10

query: UPDATE update_test t SET t.b = t.b + 10 WHERE t.a = 10
expected: UPDATE update_test AS t SET t.b = t.b + 10 WHERE t.a = 10

query: UPDATE update_test SET a=v.i FROM (VALUES(100, 20)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.b = v.j
expected: UPDATE update_test SET a = v.i FROM (VALUES (100, 20)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.b = v.j

query: UPDATE update_test SET a = v.* FROM (VALUES(100, 20)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.b = v.j
expected: UPDATE update_test SET a = v.* FROM (VALUES (100, 20)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.b = v.j

query: INSERT INTO update_test SELECT a,b+1,c FROM update_test
expected: INSERT INTO update_test SELECT a, b + 1, c FROM update_test

query: UPDATE update_test SET (c,b,a) = ('bugle', b+11, DEFAULT) WHERE c = 'foo'
expected: UPDATE update_test SET c = ('bugle', b + 11, DEFAULT), b = ('bugle', b + 11, DEFAULT), a = ('bugle', b + 11, DEFAULT) WHERE c = 'foo'

query: UPDATE update_test SET (c,b) = ('car', a+b), a = a + 1 WHERE a = 10
expected: UPDATE update_test SET c = ('car', a + b), b = ('car', a + b), a = a + 1 WHERE a = 10

query: UPDATE update_test SET (c,b) = ('car', a+b), b = a + 1 WHERE a = 10
expected: UPDATE update_test SET c = ('car', a + b), b = ('car', a + b), b = a + 1 WHERE a = 10

query: UPDATE update_test SET (b,a) = (select a,b from update_test where b = 41 and c = 'car') WHERE a = 100 AND b = 20
expected: UPDATE update_test SET b = (SELECT a, b FROM update_test WHERE b = 41 AND c = 'car'), a = (SELECT a, b FROM update_test WHERE b = 41 AND c = 'car') WHERE a = 100 AND b = 20

query: UPDATE update_test o SET (b,a) = (select a+1,b from update_test i where i.a=o.a and i.b=o.b and i.c is not distinct from o.c)
expected: UPDATE update_test AS o SET b = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test AS i WHERE i.a = o.a AND i.b = o.b AND i.c IS NOT DISTINCT FROM o.c), a = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test AS i WHERE i.a = o.a AND i.b = o.b AND i.c IS NOT DISTINCT FROM o.c)

query: UPDATE update_test SET (b,a) = (select a+1,b from update_test)
expected: UPDATE update_test SET b = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test), a = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test)

query: UPDATE update_test SET (b,a) = (select a+1,b from update_test where a = 1000) WHERE a = 11
expected: UPDATE update_test SET b = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test WHERE a = 1000), a = (SELECT a + 1, b FROM update_test WHERE a = 1000) WHERE a = 11

query: UPDATE update_test SET (a,b) = ROW(v.*) FROM (VALUES(21, 100)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.a = v.i
expected: UPDATE update_test SET a = ROW(v.*), b = ROW(v.*) FROM (VALUES (21, 100)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.a = v.i

query: UPDATE update_test SET (a,b) = (v.*) FROM (VALUES(21, 101)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.a = v.i
expected: UPDATE update_test SET a = (v.*), b = (v.*) FROM (VALUES (21, 101)) AS v(i, j) WHERE update_test.a = v.i

query: UPDATE update_test AS t SET b = update_test.b + 10 WHERE t.a = 10
UPDATE update_test SET c = repeat('x', 10000) WHERE c = 'car'
SELECT a, b, char_length(c) FROM update_test
EXPLAIN (VERBOSE, COSTS OFF) UPDATE update_test t SET (a, b) = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test s WHERE s.a = t.a) WHERE CURRENT_USER = SESSION_USER
expected: EXPLAIN (VERBOSE true, COSTS false) UPDATE update_test AS t SET a = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test AS s WHERE s.a = t.a), b = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test AS s WHERE s.a = t.a) WHERE CURRENT_USER = SESSION_USER

query: UPDATE update_test t SET (a, b) = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test s WHERE s.a = t.a) WHERE CURRENT_USER = SESSION_USER
expected: UPDATE update_test AS t SET a = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test AS s WHERE s.a = t.a), b = (SELECT b, a FROM update_test AS s WHERE s.a = t.a) WHERE CURRENT_USER = SESSION_USER

query: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES(1, 'Boo'), (3, 'Zoo')
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Boo'), (3, 'Zoo')

query: WITH aaa AS (SELECT 1 AS a, 'Foo' AS b) INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bar') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT b, a FROM aaa) RETURNING *
expected: WITH aaa AS (SELECT 1 AS a, 'Foo' AS b) INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bar') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT b, a FROM aaa), a = (SELECT b, a FROM aaa) RETURNING *

query: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Baz'), (3, 'Zaz') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT b || ', Correlated', a from upsert_test i WHERE i.a = upsert_test.a) RETURNING *
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Baz'), (3, 'Zaz') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT b || ', Correlated', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = upsert_test.a), a = (SELECT b || ', Correlated', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = upsert_test.a) RETURNING *

query: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bat'), (3, 'Zot') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a from upsert_test i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING *
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bat'), (3, 'Zot') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a), a = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING *

query: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (2, 'Beeble') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a from upsert_test i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid AS xmin_correct, xmax = 0 AS xmax_correct
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (2, 'Beeble') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a), a = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_correct, xmax = 0 AS xmax_correct

query: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (2, 'Brox') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a from upsert_test i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid AS xmin_correct, xmax = pg_current_xact_id()::xid AS xmax_correct
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (2, 'Brox') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a), a = (SELECT b || ', Excluded', a FROM upsert_test AS i WHERE i.a = excluded.a) RETURNING CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_correct, xmax = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmax_correct

query: DROP TABLE update_test
DROP TABLE upsert_test
CREATE TABLE upsert_test ( a   INT PRIMARY KEY, b   TEXT ) PARTITION BY LIST (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE upsert_test (a INT PRIMARY KEY, b TEXT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: CREATE TABLE upsert_test_1 PARTITION OF upsert_test FOR VALUES IN (1)
CREATE TABLE upsert_test_2 (b TEXT, a INT PRIMARY KEY)
ALTER TABLE upsert_test ATTACH PARTITION upsert_test_2 FOR VALUES IN (2)
INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES(1, 'Boo'), (2, 'Zoo')
expected: INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Boo'), (2, 'Zoo')

query: WITH aaa AS (SELECT 1 AS ctea, ' Foo' AS cteb) INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bar'), (2, 'Baz') ON CONFLICT(a) DO UPDATE SET (b, a) = (SELECT upsert_test.b||cteb, upsert_test.a FROM aaa) RETURNING *
expected: WITH aaa AS (SELECT 1 AS ctea, ' Foo' AS cteb) INSERT INTO upsert_test VALUES (1, 'Bar'), (2, 'Baz') ON CONFLICT (a) DO UPDATE SET b = (SELECT upsert_test.b || cteb, upsert_test.a FROM aaa), a = (SELECT upsert_test.b || cteb, upsert_test.a FROM aaa) RETURNING *

query: CREATE TABLE range_parted ( a text, b bigint, c numeric, d int, e varchar ) PARTITION BY RANGE (a, b)
expected: CREATE TABLE range_parted (a TEXT, b BIGINT, c NUMERIC, d INT, e VARCHAR) PARTITION BY range (a, b)

query: CREATE TABLE part_b_20_b_30 (e varchar, c numeric, a text, b bigint, d int)
expected: CREATE TABLE part_b_20_b_30 (e VARCHAR, c NUMERIC, a TEXT, b BIGINT, d INT)

query: ALTER TABLE range_parted ATTACH PARTITION part_b_20_b_30 FOR VALUES FROM ('b', 20) TO ('b', 30)
CREATE TABLE part_b_10_b_20 (e varchar, c numeric, a text, b bigint, d int) PARTITION BY RANGE (c)
expected: CREATE TABLE part_b_10_b_20 (e VARCHAR, c NUMERIC, a TEXT, b BIGINT, d INT) PARTITION BY range (c)

query: CREATE TABLE part_b_1_b_10 PARTITION OF range_parted FOR VALUES FROM ('b', 1) TO ('b', 10)
ALTER TABLE range_parted ATTACH PARTITION part_b_10_b_20 FOR VALUES FROM ('b', 10) TO ('b', 20)
CREATE TABLE part_a_10_a_20 PARTITION OF range_parted FOR VALUES FROM ('a', 10) TO ('a', 20)
CREATE TABLE part_a_1_a_10 PARTITION OF range_parted FOR VALUES FROM ('a', 1) TO ('a', 10)
UPDATE part_b_10_b_20 set b = b - 6
expected: UPDATE part_b_10_b_20 SET b = b - 6

query: CREATE TABLE part_c_100_200 (e varchar, c numeric, a text, b bigint, d int) PARTITION BY range (abs(d))

query: ALTER TABLE part_c_100_200 DROP COLUMN e, DROP COLUMN c, DROP COLUMN a
ALTER TABLE part_c_100_200 ADD COLUMN c numeric, ADD COLUMN e varchar, ADD COLUMN a text
expected: ALTER TABLE part_c_100_200 ADD COLUMN c NUMERIC, ADD COLUMN e VARCHAR, ADD COLUMN a TEXT

ALTER TABLE part_c_100_200 ADD COLUMN b bigint
expected: ALTER TABLE part_c_100_200 ADD COLUMN b BIGINT

CREATE TABLE part_d_15_20 PARTITION OF part_c_100_200 FOR VALUES FROM (15) TO (20)

expected: CREATE TABLE part_c_1_100 (e VARCHAR, d INT, c NUMERIC, b BIGINT, a TEXT)

expected: UPDATE part_c_100_200 SET c = c - 20, d = c WHERE c = 105

expected: UPDATE part_b_10_b_20 SET c = c + 20 RETURNING c, b, a

query: UPDATE part_b_10_b_20 set b = b - 6 WHERE c > 116 returning *
expected: UPDATE part_b_10_b_20 SET b = b - 6 WHERE c > 116 RETURNING *

expected: UPDATE range_parted SET b = b - 6 WHERE c > 116 RETURNING a, b + c

expected: UPDATE upview SET c = 199 WHERE b = 4

expected: UPDATE range_parted SET c = 95 WHERE a = 'b' AND b > 10 AND c > 100 RETURNING (range_parted), *

query: CREATE FUNCTION trans_updatetrigfunc() RETURNS trigger LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ begin raise notice 'trigger = %, old table = %, new table = %', TG_NAME, (select string_agg(old_table::text, ', ' ORDER BY a) FROM old_table), (select string_agg(new_table::text, ', ' ORDER BY a) FROM new_table); return null; end; $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION trans_updatetrigfunc () RETURNS trigger LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ begin raise notice 'trigger = %, old table = %, new table = %', TG_NAME, (select string_agg(old_table::text, ', ' ORDER BY a) FROM old_table), (select string_agg(new_table::text, ', ' ORDER BY a) FROM new_table); return null; end; $$

query: CREATE TRIGGER trans_updatetrig AFTER UPDATE ON range_parted REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS old_table NEW TABLE AS new_table FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE trans_updatetrigfunc()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER trans_updatetrig AFTER UPDATE ON range_parted REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS old_table NEW TABLE AS new_table EXECUTE FUNCTION trans_updatetrigfunc()

query: UPDATE range_parted set c = (case when c = 96 then 110 else c + 1 end ) WHERE a = 'b' and b > 10 and c >= 96
expected: UPDATE range_parted SET c = (CASE WHEN c = 96 THEN 110 ELSE c + 1 END) WHERE a = 'b' AND b > 10 AND c >= 96

query: CREATE TRIGGER trans_deletetrig AFTER DELETE ON range_parted REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS old_table FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE trans_updatetrigfunc()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER trans_deletetrig AFTER DELETE ON range_parted REFERENCING OLD TABLE AS old_table EXECUTE FUNCTION trans_updatetrigfunc()

query: CREATE TRIGGER trans_inserttrig AFTER INSERT ON range_parted REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS new_table FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE trans_updatetrigfunc()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER trans_inserttrig AFTER INSERT ON range_parted REFERENCING NEW TABLE AS new_table EXECUTE FUNCTION trans_updatetrigfunc()

create table part_def partition of range_parted default
expected: CREATE TABLE part_def PARTITION OF range_parted DEFAULT

query: update part_def set a = 'd' where a = 'c'
expected: UPDATE part_def SET a = 'd' WHERE a = 'c'

query: update part_def set a = 'a' where a = 'd'
expected: UPDATE part_def SET a = 'a' WHERE a = 'd'

query: UPDATE part_a_10_a_20 set a = 'ad' WHERE a = 'a'
expected: UPDATE part_a_10_a_20 SET a = 'ad' WHERE a = 'a'

query: UPDATE range_parted set a = 'ad' WHERE a = 'a'
expected: UPDATE range_parted SET a = 'ad' WHERE a = 'a'

query: UPDATE range_parted set a = 'bd' WHERE a = 'b'
expected: UPDATE range_parted SET a = 'bd' WHERE a = 'b'

query: UPDATE range_parted set a = 'a' WHERE a = 'ad'
expected: UPDATE range_parted SET a = 'a' WHERE a = 'ad'

query: UPDATE range_parted set a = 'b' WHERE a = 'bd'
expected: UPDATE range_parted SET a = 'b' WHERE a = 'bd'

query: DROP TABLE range_parted
CREATE TABLE list_parted ( a text, b int ) PARTITION BY list (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE list_parted (a TEXT, b INT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: CREATE TABLE list_part1  PARTITION OF list_parted for VALUES in ('a', 'b')
expected: CREATE TABLE list_part1 PARTITION OF list_parted FOR VALUES IN ('a', 'b')

query: CREATE TABLE list_default PARTITION OF list_parted default
expected: CREATE TABLE list_default PARTITION OF list_parted DEFAULT

query: INSERT into list_part1 VALUES ('a', 1)
expected: INSERT INTO list_part1 VALUES ('a', 1)

query: INSERT into list_default VALUES ('d', 10)
expected: INSERT INTO list_default VALUES ('d', 10)

query: UPDATE list_default set a = 'a' WHERE a = 'd'
expected: UPDATE list_default SET a = 'a' WHERE a = 'd'

query: UPDATE list_default set a = 'x' WHERE a = 'd'
expected: UPDATE list_default SET a = 'x' WHERE a = 'd'

query: DROP TABLE list_parted
create table utrtest (a int, b text) partition by list (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE utrtest (a INT, b TEXT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: create table utr1 (a int check (a in (1)), q text, b text)
expected: CREATE TABLE utr1 (a INT CHECK (a IN (1)), q TEXT, b TEXT)

query: create table utr2 (a int check (a in (2)), b text)
expected: CREATE TABLE utr2 (a INT CHECK (a IN (2)), b TEXT)

query: alter table utr1 drop column q
expected: ALTER TABLE utr1 DROP COLUMN q

query: alter table utrtest attach partition utr1 for values in (1)
expected: ALTER TABLE utrtest ATTACH PARTITION utr1 FOR VALUES IN (1)

query: alter table utrtest attach partition utr2 for values in (2)
expected: ALTER TABLE utrtest ATTACH PARTITION utr2 FOR VALUES IN (2)

query: insert into utrtest values (1, 'foo') returning *, tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid as xmin_ok
expected: INSERT INTO utrtest VALUES (1, 'foo') RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_ok

query: insert into utrtest values (2, 'bar') returning *, tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid as xmin_ok
expected: INSERT INTO utrtest VALUES (2, 'bar') RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_ok

query: insert into utrtest values (2, 'bar') returning *, tableoid::regclass
expected: INSERT INTO utrtest VALUES (2, 'bar') RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass)

query: update utrtest set b = b || b from (values (1), (2)) s(x) where a = s.x returning *, tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid as xmin_ok
expected: UPDATE utrtest SET b = b || b FROM (VALUES (1), (2)) AS s(x) WHERE a = s.x RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_ok

query: update utrtest set a = 3 - a from (values (1), (2)) s(x) where a = s.x returning *, tableoid::regclass, xmin = pg_current_xact_id()::xid as xmin_ok
expected: UPDATE utrtest SET a = 3 - a FROM (VALUES (1), (2)) AS s(x) WHERE a = s.x RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmin = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmin_ok

query: update utrtest set a = 3 - a from (values (1), (2)) s(x) where a = s.x returning *, tableoid::regclass
expected: UPDATE utrtest SET a = 3 - a FROM (VALUES (1), (2)) AS s(x) WHERE a = s.x RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass)

query: delete from utrtest returning *, tableoid::regclass, xmax = pg_current_xact_id()::xid as xmax_ok
expected: DELETE FROM utrtest RETURNING *, CAST(tableoid AS regclass), xmax = CAST(pg_current_xact_id() AS xid) AS xmax_ok

query: drop table utrtest
expected: DROP TABLE utrtest

query: CREATE TABLE list_parted (a numeric, b int, c int8) PARTITION BY list (a)
expected: CREATE TABLE list_parted (a NUMERIC, b INT, c BIGINT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: CREATE TABLE sub_parted PARTITION OF list_parted for VALUES in (1) PARTITION BY list (b)
expected: CREATE TABLE sub_parted PARTITION OF list_parted FOR VALUES IN (1) PARTITION BY list (b)

query: CREATE TABLE sub_part1(b int, c int8, a numeric)
expected: CREATE TABLE sub_part1 (b INT, c BIGINT, a NUMERIC)

query: ALTER TABLE sub_parted ATTACH PARTITION sub_part1 for VALUES in (1)
expected: ALTER TABLE sub_parted ATTACH PARTITION sub_part1 FOR VALUES IN (1)

query: CREATE TABLE sub_part2(b int, c int8, a numeric)
expected: CREATE TABLE sub_part2 (b INT, c BIGINT, a NUMERIC)

query: ALTER TABLE sub_parted ATTACH PARTITION sub_part2 for VALUES in (2)
expected: ALTER TABLE sub_parted ATTACH PARTITION sub_part2 FOR VALUES IN (2)

query: CREATE TABLE list_part1(a numeric, b int, c int8)
expected: CREATE TABLE list_part1 (a NUMERIC, b INT, c BIGINT)

query: ALTER TABLE list_parted ATTACH PARTITION list_part1 for VALUES in (2,3)
expected: ALTER TABLE list_parted ATTACH PARTITION list_part1 FOR VALUES IN (2, 3)

query: INSERT into list_parted VALUES (2,5,50)
expected: INSERT INTO list_parted VALUES (2, 5, 50)

query: INSERT into list_parted VALUES (3,6,60)
expected: INSERT INTO list_parted VALUES (3, 6, 60)

query: INSERT into sub_parted VALUES (1,1,60)
expected: INSERT INTO sub_parted VALUES (1, 1, 60)

query: INSERT into sub_parted VALUES (1,2,10)
expected: INSERT INTO sub_parted VALUES (1, 2, 10)

query: UPDATE sub_parted set a = 2 WHERE c = 10
expected: UPDATE sub_parted SET a = 2 WHERE c = 10

query: SELECT tableoid::regclass::text, * FROM list_parted WHERE a = 2 ORDER BY 1
expected: SELECT CAST(CAST(tableoid AS regclass) AS TEXT), * FROM list_parted WHERE a = 2 ORDER BY 1

query: UPDATE list_parted set b = c + a WHERE a = 2
expected: UPDATE list_parted SET b = c + a WHERE a = 2

query: CREATE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b() returns trigger as $$ BEGIN NEW.b = 2; return NEW; END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql
expected: CREATE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b () RETURNS trigger AS $$ BEGIN NEW.b = 2; return NEW; END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql

query: CREATE TRIGGER parted_mod_b before update on sub_part1 for each row execute procedure func_parted_mod_b()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER parted_mod_b BEFORE UPDATE ON sub_part1 FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b()

query: SELECT tableoid::regclass::text, * FROM list_parted ORDER BY 1, 2, 3, 4
expected: SELECT CAST(CAST(tableoid AS regclass) AS TEXT), * FROM list_parted ORDER BY 1, 2, 3, 4

query: UPDATE list_parted set c = 70 WHERE b  = 1
expected: UPDATE list_parted SET c = 70 WHERE b = 1

query: DROP TRIGGER parted_mod_b ON sub_part1
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b() returns trigger as $$ BEGIN raise notice 'Trigger: Got OLD row %, but returning NULL', OLD; return NULL; END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b () RETURNS trigger AS $$ BEGIN raise notice 'Trigger: Got OLD row %, but returning NULL', OLD; return NULL; END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql

query: CREATE TRIGGER trig_skip_delete before delete on sub_part2 for each row execute procedure func_parted_mod_b()
expected: CREATE TRIGGER trig_skip_delete BEFORE DELETE ON sub_part2 FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION func_parted_mod_b()

query: UPDATE list_parted set b = 1 WHERE c = 70
expected: UPDATE list_parted SET b = 1 WHERE c = 70

query: DROP TRIGGER trig_skip_delete ON sub_part2
CREATE TABLE non_parted (id int)
expected: CREATE TABLE non_parted (id INT)

query: INSERT into non_parted VALUES (1), (1), (1), (2), (2), (2), (3), (3), (3)
expected: INSERT INTO non_parted VALUES (1), (1), (1), (2), (2), (2), (3), (3), (3)

query: UPDATE list_parted t1 set a = 2 FROM non_parted t2 WHERE t1.a = t2.id and a = 1
expected: UPDATE list_parted AS t1 SET a = 2 FROM non_parted AS t2 WHERE t1.a = t2.id AND a = 1

query: DROP TABLE non_parted
create or replace function dummy_hashint4(a int4, seed int8) returns int8 as $$ begin return (a + seed); end; $$ language 'plpgsql' immutable
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION dummy_hashint4 (a INT, seed BIGINT) RETURNS BIGINT AS $$ begin return (a + seed); end; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql IMMUTABLE

query: create operator class custom_opclass for type int4 using hash as operator 1 = , function 2 dummy_hashint4(int4, int8)
expected: CREATE OPERATOR CLASS custom_opclass FOR TYPE INT USING hash AS OPERATOR 1 =, FUNCTION 2 dummy_hashint4(int4, int8)

query: create table hash_parted ( a int, b int ) partition by hash (a custom_opclass, b custom_opclass)
expected: CREATE TABLE hash_parted (a INT, b INT) PARTITION BY hash (a custom_opclass, b custom_opclass)

query: create table hpart1 partition of hash_parted for values with (modulus 2, remainder 1)
expected: CREATE TABLE hpart1 PARTITION OF hash_parted FOR VALUES WITH (modulus 2, remainder 1)

query: create table hpart2 partition of hash_parted for values with (modulus 4, remainder 2)
expected: CREATE TABLE hpart2 PARTITION OF hash_parted FOR VALUES WITH (modulus 4, remainder 2)

query: create table hpart3 partition of hash_parted for values with (modulus 8, remainder 0)
expected: CREATE TABLE hpart3 PARTITION OF hash_parted FOR VALUES WITH (modulus 8, remainder 0)

query: create table hpart4 partition of hash_parted for values with (modulus 8, remainder 4)
expected: CREATE TABLE hpart4 PARTITION OF hash_parted FOR VALUES WITH (modulus 8, remainder 4)

query: insert into hpart1 values (1, 1)
expected: INSERT INTO hpart1 VALUES (1, 1)

query: insert into hpart2 values (2, 5)
expected: INSERT INTO hpart2 VALUES (2, 5)

query: insert into hpart4 values (3, 4)
expected: INSERT INTO hpart4 VALUES (3, 4)

query: update hpart1 set a = 3, b=4 where a = 1
expected: UPDATE hpart1 SET a = 3, b = 4 WHERE a = 1

query: update hash_parted set b = b - 1 where b = 1
expected: UPDATE hash_parted SET b = b - 1 WHERE b = 1

query: update hash_parted set b = b + 8 where b = 1
expected: UPDATE hash_parted SET b = b + 8 WHERE b = 1

query: drop table hash_parted
expected: DROP TABLE hash_parted

query: drop operator class custom_opclass using hash
expected: DROP OPERATOR CLASS custom_opclass USING hash RESTRICT

query: drop function dummy_hashint4(a int4, seed int8)
expected: DROP FUNCTION dummy_hashint4(a INT, seed BIGINT)
